name: note-templates
title: Note Templates
description: Templates to create notes for Raycast Notes, Apple Notes, and more
author: ninjiacoder

commands.name: show-note-templates
commands.title: Show Note Templates
commands.description: Browse and use your saved templates

tools.name: get-all-templates
tools.title: Get All Templates
tools.description: Retrieve all saved templates from storage

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
